text: “Chaba e e bosula e, e tshwana le motho a tsenywe ke mowa o o maswe. Gonne fa mowa o o maswe o tswa mo go ene, o ya mo dikakeng ka lobakanyana, o senka boikhutso mme o seke o bo bone. Mme o re, ‘Ke tlaa boela kwa mothong yo ke neng ke tswa mo go ene’ o boe o fitlhele pelo ya motho yoo e le phepa e bile e sena sepe mo teng! Mme mowa o o maswe o bone mewa e mengwe e supa e e bosula go o gaisa, mme yotlhe e tsene motho yoo e nne mo go ene. Mme a bife go gaisa pele.”
